1.name: Mighty
1.description: Your gifted stone provides two bonds (instead of one) to all spaces horizontally and vertically in line with it, unless blocked by a mountain.

2.name: Perceptive
2.description: Your gifted stone additionally provides one bond to all spaces diagonally in line with it, unless blocked by the center of a mountain.

3.name: Bountiful
3.description: Your gifted stone allows you to take one additional boon of your choice, chosen from the boons in the space, when you play a common stone in any surrounding space (including diagonally adjacent spaces).

4.name: Favored
4.description: Your gifted stone lets you gain the favor of a Beast of a mountain that your gifted stone is guarding if you have the same number of stones guarding it as your opponent

5.name: Random
5.description: One of the 4 gifted cards, chosen at random
